#text=Last Saturday , I decided to visit a friend in the hospital .
#text=I own a car , but it 's been acting up lately , so I needed to take the bus .
#text=I set out from my apartment with a spring in my step , because it was an amazing day .
#text=I walked through my apartment complex 's parking lot to reach the bus stop , where I waited for the bus around 5 minutes .
#text=When it came to a stop in front of me , I boarded and put a $ 1 bill and 2 quarters in the fare machine .
#text=I selected a seat near the entrance , because it has more space and fewer people .
#text=Riding the bus often gives me motion sickness , so I closed my eyes and tried to ignore the swaying motion as it rolled down the street .
#text=Behind me , two college students were eagerly discussing a class project .
#text=In the very back , a small child was loudly pretending to be a dinosaur .
#text=I was glad when I finally reached my destination .
#text=I pulled the cord signaling that I would need the bus to stop next to the hospital , and got up to exit out the bus 's side door .
